properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_HT_$BASEKEY JOIN (SELECT $BASEKEY_NO FROM TB_$BASEKEY JOIN TB_MEMBER ON ($BASEKEY_WRITER_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE $BASEKEY_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ) USING ($BASEKEY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE $BASEKEY_NO = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY HT_$BASEKEY_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_HT_REPLY JOIN (SELECT REPLY_NO FROM TB_REPLY JOIN (SELECT RECIPE_NO FROM TB_RECIPE JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (RECIPE_WRITER_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE RECIPE_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ) USING (RECIPE_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (REPLY_WRITER_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ) USING (REPLY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY HT_REPLY_DATE DESC
